00017 package org.bn.mq;
00018 
00019 import java.util.HashMap;
00020 import java.util.Map;
00021 
00022 import org.bn.mq.impl.InMemoryStorage;
00023 import org.bn.mq.impl.MessagingBus;
00024 import org.bn.mq.impl.NullStorage;
00025 import org.bn.mq.impl.PriorityQueue;
00026 import org.bn.mq.impl.Queue;
00027 import org.bn.mq.impl.SQLStorage;
00028 
00032 public class MQFactory {
00033     private static MQFactory instance = new MQFactory();
00034         
00035     protected MQFactory() {
00036     }    
00037     
00042     public static MQFactory getInstance() {
00043         return instance;
00044     }
00045     
00050     public IMessagingBus createMessagingBus() {
00051         return new MessagingBus();
00052     }
00053     
00059     public <T> IQueue<T> createQueue(Class<T> messageClass) {
00060         return createQueue("simple",messageClass);
00061     }
00062 
00069     public <T> IQueue<T> createQueue(String algorithm, Class<T> messageClass) {
00070         if(algorithm == null || (algorithm!=null && algorithm.equalsIgnoreCase("simple"))) {
00071             return new Queue<T>();
00072         }
00073         else
00074         if(algorithm.equalsIgnoreCase("priority")) {
00075             return new PriorityQueue<T>();
00076         }
00077         else
00078             return null;
00079     }
00080     
00088     public <T> IPersistenceStorage<T> createPersistenceStorage(String storageType, Map<String,Object> storageProperties, Class<T> messageClass) throws Exception {
00089         if(storageType == null || (storageType!=null && storageType.length() == 0)) {
00090             return new NullStorage<T>(storageProperties);
00091         }
00092         else
00093         if(storageType.equalsIgnoreCase("InMemory")) {
00094             return new InMemoryStorage<T>(storageProperties);
00095         }
00096         else
00097         if(storageType.equalsIgnoreCase("SQL")) {
00098             return new SQLStorage<T>(storageProperties);
00099         }
00100         else
00101             return null;
00102     }
00103 }
